title: Focus does not move to search bar when painting existing search filter (selecting with left mouse button down)
author: bluikko
body_snippet:
If a connection is open and focus is in the connection window, then painting in search bar does not move the focus to the search bar. Keystrokes after the painting are sent to the open connection.

## Expected Behavior
* Have a connection window open with focus in it.
* Paint the existing search filter/part of it in the search bar.
* Type some characters, the characters typed should replace the selected/painted part of the search filter in the search box.
